mapper.select: SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY mem_num DESC

select mem_num, mem_name, mem_email, CASE WHEN mem_birth IS NULL THEN '등록 정보 없음' ELSE mem_birth END as mem_birth, CASE WHEN mem_phone IS NULL THEN '등록 정보 없음' ELSE mem_phone END as mem_phone, mem_point, mem_note, mem_regdate from members WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num}
